    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(int stage,
             java.lang.String bonus,
             int pacmanSpeed,
             int pacmanEatingDotsSpeed,
             int ghostsSpeed,
             int ghostsTunelSpeed,
             int cruiseElroyDotsLeft1,
             int cruiseElroySpeed1,
             int cruiseElroyDotsLeft2,
             int cruiseElroySpeed2,
             int pacmanWithEnergizerSpeed,
             int pacmanWithEnergizerEatingDotsSpeed,
             int frightGhostsSpeed,
             int frightTime)
        Creates a level with a determinate stage, characters and time lapses.
        Parameters:
        stage - is an integer that represents the actual stage.
        bonus - is an integer that represents the bonus points.
        pacmanSpeed - is an integer that represents the actual Pacman speed in the maze.
        pacmanEatingDotsSpeed - is an integer that represents the actual Pacman speed in the maze when it is eating pacdocts.
        ghostsSpeed - is an integer that represents the ghosts speed in the game in a determinate stage.
        ghostsTunelSpeed - is an integer that represents the ghosts speed when it is trying to pass along the tunnel.
        cruiseElroyDotsLeft1 - is an integer that represents the number of first dots remaining at left.
        cruiseElroySpeed1 - is an integer that represents the first speed associated with the first dots remaining at left.
        cruiseElroyDotsLeft2 - is an integer that represents the number of second dots remaining at left.
        cruiseElroySpeed2 - is an integer that represents the second speed associated with the second dots remaining at left.
        pacmanWithEnergizerSpeed - is an integer that represents Pacman speed when he eats an energizer.
        pacmanWithEnergizerEatingDotsSpeed - is an integer that represents Pacman speed when he eats an energizer and besides dots.
        frightGhostsSpeed - is an integer that represents the ghosts speed when they are frightened by the energizer eating.
        frightTime - is an integer that represents the period during which the ghosts are frightened.
